          <title>
            <string language="en">Growth of seedling inside a glass jar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wachstum des Sämlings innerhalb eines 
Glasglases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Croissance de jeune plante à l'intérieur d'une 
fiole en verre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Crescimento do seedling dentro de um frasco de 
vidro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppo del semenzale all'interno di un vaso di 
vetro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αύξηση του σποροφύτου μέσα σε ένα βάζο γυαλιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Crecimiento de la planta de semillero dentro de 
un tarro de cristal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the formation of water droplets on the glass jar that covers the seedling growing on a damp flower pot.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">droplets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flower pot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glass jar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">growing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">seedling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Anordnung der 
Wassertröpfchen auf dem Glasglas, das den Sämling bedeckt, der auf 
einem feuchten Blumetopf wächst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formation des 
gouttelettes de l'eau sur la fiole en verre qui couvre la jeune plante
accroissant sur un pot humide de fleur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a formação de gotas da
água no frasco de vidro que cobre o seedling que cresce em um 
potenciômetro úmido da flor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formazione delle 
goccioline dell'acqua sul vaso di vetro che copre il semenzale che 
cresce su un POT umido del fiore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το σχηματισμό των 
σταγονίδιων ύδατος στο βάζο γυαλιού που καλύπτει την ανάπτυξη 
σποροφύτων σε ένα υγρό δοχείο λουλουδιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la formación de las 
gotitas del agua en el tarro de cristal que cubre la planta de 
semillero que crece en un crisol húmedo de la flor.</string>
          </description>
